Citations.Cited_Guidance: If the intervention model indicates a single group design then only one intervention is expected. In all other cases more interventions are expected.

rule.Check:
($.study.versions)@$sv.
    ($sv.studyDesigns)@$sd.
            {
                "id": $sd.id,
                "name": $sd.name,
                "interventionModel.code": $sd.interventionModel.code,
                "interventionModel.decode": $sd.interventionModel.decode,
                "# Study Interventions":  $count($sd.studyInterventions),
                "instanceType": $sd.instanceType
            }
            [
                (`interventionModel.code` = "C82640" and `# Study Interventions` != 1) or
                (`interventionModel.code` != "C82640" and `# Study Interventions` <= 1)
            ]
rule.Description: If the intervention model indicates a single group design then only one intervention is expected. In all other cases more interventions are expected.

Outcome.Message: The number of study interventions defined for the study design is not consistent with intervention model specified for the study design - either the model indicates a single group and there is not only one study intervention, or the model does not indicate a single group and there are not multiple study interventions.
